summary: um absolutely bizarre out of nowhere crack theory... but what if lady stoneheart has just been following arya (since she...
body:
um absolutely bizarre out of nowhere crack theory…

but what if lady stoneheart has just been following arya (since she murdered the freys). i assume LS was still intending on a red wedding 2.0 and once she heard arya did it, just followed her back to winterfell, and has been lurking in the crypts, just makin sure the kids are alright !!! (wouldnt it be sick if she learned the truth about jon!!! aw. they can be friends now.)

ANYWAYS she finally decides to make an appearance and shows herself to Arya  (maybe bc arya’s injured and she wants to help her)… but arya assumes she’s a wight and just fuckin BOLTS in fear. and that’s what we see her running from in the trailer. it’s been speculated she’s running from someone she knows who has been raised as a wight.

(ik this is sooo unlikely i would just love a lady stoneheart appearance)

summary: asoiaf & got characters // pt. XXIII - Jon and Arya “They had always been close. Jon had their father's face, as she did. They...
caption:
asoiaf & got characters // pt. XXIII - Jon and Arya

“They had always been close. Jon had their father’s face, as she did. They were the only ones. Robb and Sansa and Bran and even little Rickon all took after the Tullys, with easy smiles and fire in their hair. When Arya had been little, she had been afraid that meant that she was a bastard too. […] She would have given anything if Jon had been here to call her “little sister” and muss her hair.”

summary: Arya’s New Weapon and Gendry’s purpose in season 8
title: Arya’s New Weapon and Gendry’s purpose in season 8
body: Okay guys I was re-watching the Gendry/Arya reunion scene and it hit me. I admit its a bit crazy but here me out. In Season 3 the scene between Gendry and Melisandre when he is being sold, she says: You are more than they can ever be you will make kings rise and fall. Now as far as I know Gendry doesn’t have any secret powers or is a more skilled warrior than Jon or Arya or any of the mains however he does have the power to make things aka making weapons !! Cue Arya’s weapon. Gendry is going to make Arya a weapon which will be used to defeat the night king. Gendry will make a king fall by making the weapon that will end him and consequently make a king rise (or queen its open to debate) I believe this explains why they bought his character back after all these seasons. It ties in with Melisandre’s words- and gives his character an important role in the final storyline. As much as I’d love to imagine they just bought him back to be with Arya (my shipper heart died when they reunited…) this is GoT people and they don’t just bring characters back for no reason or leave loose ends.

As much as I’d love to imagine they just bought him back to be with Arya (my shipper heart died when they reunited…) this is GoT people and they don’t just bring characters back for no reason or leave loose ends.
